section.heading: Savings clause.
section.text: The rules that any agency, department, or administration, the functions of which are transferred by this chapter to the Department of Buildings, has promulgated that do not conflict with this chapter shall remain in effect until amended or repealed by rules promulgated in accordance with this chapter.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 23-269: § 601 of D.C. Law 23-269 provided that the creation of this section by § 402 of D.C. Law 23-269 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 23-269: § 601 of D.C. Law 23-269 provided that the creation of this section by § 402 of D.C. Law 23-269 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Section 7276 of D.C. Law 24-45 repealed the applicability provision of section 601 of D.C. Law 23-269 that impacted this section. Therefore the creation of this section by Law 23-269 has been implemented.
